comment: if you cant grant su, open SU options, disable "tapjacking protection",  relaunch ghost, grant access, and then if you want,  re-enable tapjack... Ghost Log is an overlay so it gets blocked.

title: Same problem as the guy below me
comment: Everytime I press grant to allow superuser access nothing happens. Like it ignores my presses.

title: Good app -
comment: Its a good.. app.. to get log data's n even mail it Thanks for good apps

title: Thoughtful app
comment: I'm a developer and need to test a lot of things based on logs. I have crashlytics installed but it's not the complete package since my team's Q&A don't have much knowledge about android. This app helps us in performing some basic tests based on logs and the best part is you do not need to have root access. A lot of thought has gone in building this app. Thanks!

title: Useless
comment: Takes me to settings page just after granting root acess immediately after fresh install where I'm unable to do anything except back out and.. uninstall... Is android 5.0 lollipop supported?

title: Cant share
comment: Cant share log info for an app that doesnt work with the developer ... any thoughts guys???

title: Awesome!
comment: Neat way of finding out how stuff works!  TCT Alcatel OT  7040E -rooted

title: Great log viewer
comment: This is a very clever app that does a great job of allowing you to troubleshoot strange crashes and see what your device up to. Like others I was not able to hit grant in the sudo window that popped up, but I was able to go into SuperSU and grant access in the list of apps there.
Can't select allow for SU. I see others had same problem, running Lollipop 5.02

title: Very cool logger with different filters and logs.
comment: The thing that makes this logging app stand out is that it is always displayed. You can watch what's going on in real time without having to switch back and forth to check the log. You can change the opacity and the text size. No problems with 4.4.4 2012 Nexus 7 and SuperSU

title: Launch Those Rockets
comment: Ditto Ditto Ditto

title: very odd
comment: cm 11 m9 when requesting su,  it wont let me press allow,  ive reinstalled and same issue,  very very strange.  I can select deny but not accept,  this is first time its happened.

title: Galaxy S5
comment: It's simply awesome. A must-have app for backtracing the bugs!  I really ove your overlay screen idea 👍

title: Excellent
comment: Well done. Makes it very easy to watch logs locally while using phone

title: Excellent app
comment: A huge help would pay for a pimped out version.

title: Unable to return to app
comment: It hangs when clicking the notification while in overlay mode.

title: Missing feature..
comment: Great tool, but using OS 4.1.2 on a K2_CL there is no option in the notification bar to share, pause, and/or play. Specifically to share/save the logcat. Please add the ability to save the logcat for lesser API. The inability to review the logcat makes it pointless. Otherwise, very nice.

title: Excellent !
comment: You must have this app if you're an Android developer. Can see all the logs in the screen. No need to skip to DDMS to see the logs if you are using Eclipse. Thanks to the developer.

title: Great
comment: Much better than other logcat viewers, really useful to see it on screen at the same time. Filtering also very handy, as is the share feature.

title: Real ghost! Beware!
comment: Exactly what I needed, other apps requires to switch between apps. This is Perfect.  Btw, love the icon on notification bar.
